subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: For the Champions League final Saturday at the 66,000-seat Allianz Arena in Munich, both Chelsea and Bayern Munich fans have a hard-core base that sings throughout the game.
snippet: For the Champions League final Saturday at the 66,000-seat Allianz Arena in Munich, both Chelsea and Bayern Munich fans have a hard-core base that sings throughout the game.
